abstract: Breeden Capital Management, the activist hedge fund, said on Monday that it had named Joshua W. Fenton, a veteran investment professional, as its director of research and trading.
snippet: Breeden Capital Management, the activist hedge fund, said on Monday that it had named Joshua W. Fenton, a veteran investment professional, as its director of research and trading.
lead_paragraph: Breeden Capital Management, the activist hedge fund, said on Monday that it had named Joshua W. Fenton, a veteran investment professional, as its director of research and trading.

headline.main: Breeden Capital Names Research and Trading Head
